message.content:
cs.CL, cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CY 

This paper is about supervised term weighting metrics for sentiment analysis in short text. It discusses the use of different weighting metrics to improve the accuracy of sentiment analysis. The paper uses Support Vector Machine on three different datasets: Twitter, restaurant and laptop reviews. Therefore, the most likely arXiv CS sub-categories for this paper are cs.CL (Computation and Language), cs.IR (Information Retrieval), cs.LG (Machine Learning), cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence), and cs.CY (Computers and Society).
